All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseClass
This class allows us to share one pageObjectManager and webDriverManager between Step files and Hooks file.
BrowseCoursesSteps
Cucumber step file for specifying methods that are needed for steps in .feature files
ConfigFileReader
This class avoids hardcoding URLs, BrowserTypes, and others to be hardcoded in the code.
CourseDetailsPage
Applying the page pattern, all the methods related to the page where the details of a particular course are specified are implemented in this class.
CoursesPage
Applying the page pattern, all the methods related to the page where all the courses are listed are specified are implemented in this class.
DriverType
Specifies different DriverTypes that are possible.
EnvironmentType
Specifies different EnvironmentTypes that are possible.
FileReaderManager
To control object creation of all readers, we use the SingleTonPattern It's appropriate to have exactly one instance of a class that has a global point of access in the system.
HomePage
Applying the page pattern, all the methods related to the homepage are specified are implemented in this class.
Hooks
This class specifies some things that should happen before and after each scenario and test run.
OperatingSystemType
Specifies different Operating Systems that are possible.
PageObjectManager
Makes new page instance or returns the one already made.
RunnerTest
JUnit class that specifies how Cucumber should run tests.
SoftwareTestingPage
Applying the page pattern, all the methods related to the page where the details of the software testing course are specified are implemented in this class.
WebDriverManager
Allows us to let the user specify different type of browser and environment and run the test correctly.
